thread.title: Terry Wogan leaves his family just over £1million in his will after cancer death
thread.title_full: Terry Wogan leaves his family just over £1million in his will after cancer death

author: Sherna Noah
title: Terry Wogan leaves his family just over £1million in his will after cancer death
text:
Showbiz Terry Wogan leaves his family just over £1million in his will after cancer death The Radio 2 DJ, who died in 2016 at the age of 77, left a net estate worth £1,047,576 to his wife and three children Share Terry Wogan left his family just over £1million in his will (Photo: WireImage) Share     
Broadcasting legend Sir Terry Wogan left £1 million to his family in his will. 
The Radio 2 DJ, who died in 2016 at the age of 77, left a net estate worth £1,047,576 to his wife and three children. 
Sir Terry was thought to be worth around £20 million before he died, following a battle with cancer . 
He was reported to be the highest paid BBC radio presenter at one time in his career, in 2006, with an £800,000 a year salary. 
He told Hello!: "I don't give a monkey's about people knowing it. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
